Description: Tezos' next protocol upgrade, Granada, will introduce Emmy* - bringing faster finality on the path to Tenderbake.
Florence, the sixth Tezos upgrade proposal, has been fully adopted.
Florence, the sixth Tezos upgrade proposal, is only one week away from activation.
Popular Tezos NFT platform Hic et Nunc is having its first hackathon ("Hicathon") this weekend.
Synthetic Exchange Project (SEXP), a decentralized exchange on Tezos for synthetic assets, has launched their testnet.
UAE SmartCrowd Group utilizes Tezos for realestate tokenization.
Tezos Commons announced April's winners for the Community Reward Program.
KoineArth launches marketsN, one of the world's first enterprise-grade NFT platforms.
Tezos ended April with over 1.3 million total contract calls.
